page.title: 20Credits
page.content: It is only with the help and interest of the following people that this project has been completed. 1 Mr.W.I.B.James,Headmaster. 2 Mr.R.T.Rees,Project Co-ordinator. 3 Miss.E.M.Rees,Deputy Headteacher. 4 Miss M.Watts,Assistant Teacher. 5 Mr.D.Mansel Lewis,Lord Lieutenant of Dyfed. 6 Mr.P.Donaldson,Felinfoel Brewery. 7 Mr.Adriano Candelori,Sculptor. 8 Mr.Irwyn Phillips,County Councillor and Farmer. 9 Mr.R.H.Davies,Naturalist Society. 10 Beverley Jones,Class 4R.Page 18. 11 Joanne Price,Class 4R.Page 19. 12 Clare Evans,Class 3R.Page 9. 13 Sian Chambers and Leanne Thomas, Class 4R.Page 17. 14 Children of Classes 4R and 3R of Bigyn C.P.School. 15 Completed 18th July,1985.
